PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-02882020-04-28,  ,  ISED,  , 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of DAVID ROBINSON of Ottawa, Ontario, to be interim President of the Canadian Tourism Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of six months, or until such time as a new President is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective April 30, 2020.
AttachmentsAttachment
